results.name: Magic Knight RayEarth 2nd: The Missing Colors

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64 bit) or Newer (64 bit) Windows OS
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, AMD Radeon R9 270X, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64 bit) or Newer (64 bit) Windows OS
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 470, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers

Minimum:
